⚡Head of Data Science & Machine Learning🎯Digital Health Scale-Up🌎Remote (USA)💸Competitive Salary ($300K base) + EquityHelp people live healthier, stress-free lives by marketing a new category of wearable technology that improves health using touch therapy!A well known Series C healthtech is looking to onboard a Vice President of Data Science & Machine Learning that will take their product to the next level. You will be responsible for leading a team that generates ML models, algorithms, and data insights that enable exciting new health features for our users.Responsibilities:Lead a team in the development of next gen ML models, algorithms, and insightsArchitect infrastructures that enable rapid prototyping and deployment of models and insightsCross collaborating with product and software teams to incorporate design into productionAdvance the field of ML algorithms for sleep health, and publish your work at top conferences and journalsRequirements:MSc/PhD in Computer Science or Engineering8+ years of industry experience in the field of health sensing and health technologiesExperience building out ML infrastructureExpert proficiency with ML and deep learning frameworksExpert level Python, PyTorch and TensorflowExperience working with Signal Processing and Time-Series DataWhy apply:The opportunity to help scale a successful, fast-growing scale-upMedical, Dental, Life and Vision insuranceAttractive pay packageEquityUnlimited PTO401K match🌎 The role is remote (USA)📧 Interested in applying? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button or send a copy of your resume to Jamal.Aminu@storm3.com⚡ Storm3 is a HealthTech recruitment firm with clients across London, Europe and North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website www.storm3.com and follow the Storm3 Linked In page for the latest jobs and intel
